SELECT m.id, parent_id, mname, url, mtype FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND mtype!=10 AND m.id IS NOT NULL
